item.title: Thinking
item.description: %% — alias: [" “] — %% %% - metadata - tags: #on/MBTI - source: [[Carl-Jung]] - fr: [[Cognitive Functions]], [[Mindset]] %% Thinking [[First Principles Thinking]] Topics [[7 Principles of Leonardo da Vinci]] [[Critical Thinking]] [[Cognition]] In Reference to [[Carl-Jung]]’s [[Cognitive Functions]] Rooted in rationality, or the truth or falsity [[Judgment]] of the Situation. Directed thinking is “intellect”, whereas passive thinking is “intellectual intuition”. Thoughts have no personal sentiment.
